title: 服务器nick输入之后前面的昵称怎么去掉？？
author: Xiao_L233

replies.author: AT_空白
replies.txt_content:
Xiao_L233 发表于 2016-7-17 15:43
文件？还是指令啊
Essentials的配置文件

replies.author: AT_空白
replies.txt_content:
在essentials中的config.yml找到
nickname-prefix: ' '
这一项
删除就可以了

replies.author: Xiao_L233
replies.txt_content:
